column4: ok anyone here that can help me for a moment?  I have Dropbox, WhatPulse, Gnome-DO all in my startup applications and they are all checked.  However they do not start when I login or boot up the system.  I have to start them all manually every morning.  Why would this be happening?
sounds like a problem with gnome-session if you use gnome
any idea what i have to do in order to fix this?
